system: We are currently busier than usual at the moment and are experiencing extended wait times.
system: We are currently busier than usual at the moment and are experiencing extended wait times.
system: We are currently busier than usual at the moment and are experiencing extended wait times.

system: We are currently busier than usual at the moment and are experiencing extended wait times.
agent: Thank you for contacting IKEA Customer Support Center! My name is Bobba . How may I assist you?
customer: Hi Bobba, an item I bought arrived damaged. I am seeming a refund for the item.
agent: I am sorry to know that items in your order are damaged.I know this is not what you expected from the delivery
agent: I’d be glad to assist!
customer: Thank you!
agent: Welcome
agent: Before, I proceed could you please help me with your order number, phone number and which store you bought the items from ?
customer: yes one second
customer: phone number: 1243243512
customer: Order number: 471212321
customer: the store is the one in menlo, the broken item is the 	SOCKERBIT Storage box with Lid (15x30x11 ¾ ")
agent: Meanwhile I am checking. May i know how is weather at  San Francisco ?
customer: Fine, thank you. and your weather?
agent: Welcome . Here is summer going on
agent: How many quantity are damage ?
customer: Just 1
agent: I have successfully created your case, your case id is  71235234    . The refund process typically takes approximately 10-14 business days. Your refund must go through several departments prior to being issued. Please allow additional time to receive your refund. We apologize if there is a delay in receiving your refund.
customer: Thank you - please attach the following images to the ticket
agent: Welcome . Images are not required we have created case for the refund
customer: Thank you -- I would apprecaite them being attached anyways to support the speedy resolution of the ticket.
agent: Welcome
agent: I hope you are satisfied with the resolution provided, is there anything more I can assist you with?
customer: Not today, thank you for your help!
agent: After this conversation, you will receive a short survey pop-up regarding our chat interaction today. We would love to hear about your experience with us! Kindly take a moment to fill out the survey
agent: Welcome
agent: It was my pleasure chatting with you. Thank you for selecting IKEA. Please feel free to chat with us again. We are available from 08:00 AM to 12:00 AM EST. Have a lovely day ahead.

customer: Customer connected from Live Chat
system: Please hold, we're connecting you to IKEA live chat
system: Your estimated wait time is more than 10 minutes
system: We are currently busier than usual at the moment and are experiencing extended wait times.
system: We are currently busier than usual at the moment and are experiencing extended wait times.
system: We are currently busier than usual at the moment and are experiencing extended wait times.
system: We are currently busier than usual at the moment and are experiencing extended wait times.
agent: Thank you for contacting IKEA Customer Support Center! My name is Bobba . How may I assist you?
customer: 479882742
customer: I would like to cancel this order
agent: I’d be glad to assist!
agent: Please share your phone number
customer: 8327891747
agent: May i know the reason for cancellation ?
customer: No longer interested
agent: Meanwhile I am checking. May i know how is weather at  Salem ?
customer: Good
agent: I am really sorry but at this stage, we're unfortunately unable to cancel the order due to its current status in our system. I did try to submit a manual cancellation request couple of times on your behalf, but they were declined for the same reason. 

  

Typically, FedEx orders can only be canceled within 2 hours of placing them, but this also depends on the order's progress in our system. 

  

That said, you still have an of options: 
Once the item will  return to origin you will get the refund or please reach us tomorrow we will create case refund for the delay order where will create case order that order not receive to customer and will create case for the refund .
customer: When will it be shipped? This order has been on hold a dissappointingly long time
agent: This order was placed on 6/16 and as you didn't get the order . Our system allow to create case tomorrow . Request you please reach us tomorrow we will create case for the refund
customer: Ok I will reach back out tomorrow. Is there a ticket or case # to reference this chat?
agent: Sorry once we create case for the refund then only ticket number generate . We would request you please reach us tomorrow we will provide you case id number
customer: Ok
agent: I hope you are satisfied with the resolution provided, is there anything more I can assist you with?
agent: Are we still connected ?
agent: Are we still connected ?
agent: Are we still connected ?
agent: I am disconnecting due to no response. Thank you for selecting IKEA! Please feel free to chat with us again. We are available from 08:00 AM to 12:00 AM EST. Have a lovely day ahead.

customer: Customer connected from Live Chat
system: Please hold, we're connecting you to IKEA live chat
system: Your estimated wait time is more than 10 minutes
system: We are currently busier than usual at the moment and are experiencing extended wait times.
system: We are currently busier than usual at the moment and are experiencing extended wait times.
system: We are currently busier than usual at the moment and are experiencing extended wait times.
system: We are currently busier than usual at the moment and are experiencing extended wait times.
system: We are currently busier than usual at the moment and are experiencing extended wait times.
agent: Hej, thank you for contacting the IKEA, Customer Support Center! This is Nisse. I hope you are doing well. How may I assist you today?
customer: hi
agent: Hello Root
customer: i have tried to submit payment 4x with two different cards and it just says "something has gone wrong please try again or use another payment method
customer: and I have tried different payment methods, so I don't really know what else to do
agent: I'm truly sorry for the trouble you're experiencing while placing your order. Rest assured, I’ll look into this for you right away.
agent: May I have your email address please?
customer: root@gmail.com
agent: Thanks for the email address.
agent: Could you please check if these details are correct?

Root Biles
Mobile: +125145121241
Email: root@gmail.com

Billing address
2003 Lunne Dr, Pitsburgh
81315
customer: correct
agent: May I know if your billing and shipping address are the same?
customer: yes
agent: Is it work for you?

Schedule In-Home Delivery 2 person
2 deliveries
All articles available
From
$129
customer: yes
agent: This is the order total: $ 843, Shall I go ahead and place the order for you?
customer: yes please
agent: I have successfully placed the order and have shared the email with the payment link. Please complete the payment and confirm, till the time I am waiting for you. This is the order number: 471. 515. 124
customer: ok
customer: I will go check
agent: Sure Root
customer: same thing
customer: something has gone wrong and please try again
customer: or use a different payment method
agent: May I know if you cleared cache and cookies from the settings?
customer: I did not clear the cache
agent: To clear the cache and cookies: 

Click the three-dot menu in the top-right corner.
Select Settings > Privacy, search, and services.
Under Clear browsing data, click Choose what to clear.
Select Cached images and files, then click Clear now.
customer: that is not an option
customer: there is not settings and privacy in the 3 dots for me
agent: Could you let me know which web browser you're currently using?
customer: chrome
agent: For the Chrome browser, I recommend following these steps first, and then trying to complete the payment using the link I shared with you:

Click the three-dot menu in the top-right corner.
Go to More tools > Clear browsing data.
Choose a time range (e.g., "All time").
Check Cached images and files (and optionally cookies).
Click Clear data.
customer: i also tried to do it on an icognito browser
agent: In this case, I recommend waiting 2–3 hours before trying to complete the payment again. The error might be due to a temporary technical glitch.
agent: Can I just check that we're connected, please?
customer: ok thank you
agent: You're most welcome.
agent: Apart from this, is there anything else I can help you with?
agent: Thank you for selecting IKEA! Please feel free to chat with us again. We would love to hear about your experience with us! Kindly take a moment to fill out the survey. We are available from 08:00 AM to 12:00 AM EST. Have a lovely day ahead.

customer: Customer connected from Proactive Chat
system: Please hold, we're connecting you to IKEA live chat
system: Your estimated wait time is less than 3 minutes
system: Somebody will be with you shortly, our co-workers are currently assisting other customers

customer: Customer connected from Live Chat
system: Please hold, we're connecting you to IKEA live chat
system: Your estimated wait time is more than 20 minutes
system: We are currently busier than usual at the moment and are experiencing extended wait times.
system: We are currently busier than usual at the moment and are experiencing extended wait times.

system: We are currently busier than usual at the moment and are experiencing extended wait times.
system: We are currently busier than usual at the moment and are experiencing extended wait times.
agent: Thank you for contacting IKEA Customer Support Center! My name is Sot. Thank you for waiting in the queue.
agent: We are sorry that it took you longer than expected to connect with us. I'll try my best to help you quickly.
customer: Thank you, Sot!
customer: I actually only have a question about an issue that arose with my recent delivery.
agent: Hello Greta!
agent: I’d be happy to help. Please go ahead and share the details of the issue you experienced with your recent delivery, and I’ll do my best to assist you.
customer: Two of the items that I ordered, arrived broken: the funnel arrived completely shattered, and the desk organizer was dented due to heaver items pressing on it.
customer: Would it be possible to specifically exchange these items?
agent: That’s not what we want you to go through—I'm truly sorry the item arrived with broken parts. Let me take ownership of this and help get a proper replacement or solution arranged for you.
agent: Could you please help me with order number and phone number, or email address associated with the order.
customer: Of course!
customer: The order number is 473-141-5161
customer: And the email address: greta.ba@gmail.com
agent: Thank you for sharing the details. Please allow me a few moments while I check the details.
agent: Thank you, Greta! for providing the details for verification. That takes care of security, thank you for going through that with me.
agent: May I kindly request a photo of the defective item along with its article number so I can assist you further?
agent: Not in a hurry, but just to make sure, are you receiving my messages?
agent: I hope we are connected?
customer: Yes! I am sorry!
customer: I just took the photos
agent: No worries!
agent: Thank you!
agent: Thank you for sharing photo, please help me with the article number so I can assist you further?
customer: In case the article numbers aren't clear, they're: 603.954.52 for the desk organizer, and 805.219.30 for the funnel
agent: Thank you for sharing article number.
agent: Could you please confirm if it's just these two items or if there are any others as well?
customer: I did order a magazine file that was mildly dented, but once built, you could hardly tell. So, yes, it's only those two items that arrived defective.
agent: Thank you for confirming.
agent: For this, I'll need to transfer you to a resolution's team co-worker who can help you regarding this over the chat. May I know if there is any further query for me before I transfer your chat?
customer: That's all. Than you so much!
agent: No need to worry—I’ve noted down all the details of your request, so there’s no need to repeat anything you’ve already shared.
agent: You are welcome. It was nice to speak with you. Have a wonderful day ahead, and thanks for being such a lovely customer. I appreciate you being positive throughout the conversation.
customer: Thank you, also!
agent: Please be connected on this chat.
agent: Thank you for contacting IKEA. My name is Eaa and I'd be happy to assist you. Will you allow me a moment to quickly review the previous chat to get more information?
customer: Of course!
agent: Thanks for allowing me time to read the chat.
agent: I am sorry to know that few items in your order are damaged.I know this is not what you expected from the delivery
agent: I will be glad to assist you with the replacement.
customer: That would be great, thank you!
agent: You are welcome.
agent: I have tried to send replacement but 603.954.52 is out of stock now.
agent: Shall I refund this one and send the another item?
agent: I also have an option to refund both.
customer: Is it possible to know if item 603.954.52 will be in stock at a later date or if it is out of stock permanently?
customer: If it will be in stock later, and if the system allows it, I wouldn't mind waiting for both items to be sent together once they're both in stock again.
agent: It seems to be discontinued.

We were juts selling whatever is left in stock.
customer: Okay! Thank you for the clarification. In that case, a refund of both items would probably be the least hassle.
agent: Sure, please allow me 2-3 minutes to submit refund case and share details with you.
customer: Of course! Thank you
agent: You are welcome.
agent: In the meantime, may I know how are you doing today and how is the weather in Burbank?
customer: I'm doing very well, thank you. The weather is much milder than it has been at the beginning of the week.
customer: I hope you're having a wonderful day, as well, with pleasant weather.
agent: Glad to hear that you are well!

I am also doing well.

Yeah, it was hot here but raining now :)

It is little cooler.
agent: Thanks for waiting.
agent: Refund case number is 715105183.
agent: You will get an email once the refund is credited back in original source of payment. Estimated refund timeline is 7-14 business days.
customer: Awesome! Thank you so much for the effort despite this being just a small issue!
agent: You are welcome.
agent: I am glad that  I was able to assist you as per your expectations.

Have a smooth refund experience.
agent: Is there anything else apart from this, I can help you with today?
customer: That is all. Thank you!
agent: You will receive a short survey pop-up regarding our chat interaction today. We would love to hear about your experience with us! Kindly take a moment to fill out the survey.

 It was my pleasure chatting with you. .Please feel free to chat with us again. We are available from 08:00 AM to 12:00 AM EST. Have a lovely day and thank you for choosing IKEA.

customer: Customer connected from Live Chat
system: Please hold, we're connecting you to IKEA live chat
agent: Hello, and thanks for contacting IKEA! This is James at the Schaumburg location. How can I help you today?
customer: Hi, I picked up a BILLY bookcase at Schaumburg last weekend and just realized it’s missing a panel.
agent: I’m so sorry about that. We can help! Do you still have your receipt or order number from the pickup?
customer: Yes, it's #CH987654.
agent: Thanks! We’ll have a replacement panel set aside at the Schaumburg returns desk. You can pick it up any time this week.
customer: Perfect, I’ll stop by Wednesday. Thanks again!
agent: You’re very welcome. Just show them this chat or your receipt when you arrive. Have a great day!

customer: Customer connected from Live Chat
system: Please hold, we're connecting you to IKEA live chat
system: Your estimated wait time is less than 5 minutes
agent: Hello! Thanks for contacting IKEA support. How can I assist you today?
customer: Hi, I received the wrong color on my chair order.
agent: I'm sorry to hear that. Could you please provide your order number?
customer: Sure, it's 555123987.
agent: Thanks! I'm seeing the shipment: we can send a replacement chair in the correct color, free of charge.
customer: That would be great, thank you!
agent: You're welcome! Replacement has been ordered. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
customer: No, all good. Have a nice day!
agent: Great! You'll receive a confirmation email shortly. Thanks for chatting with IKEA. Goodbye!

customer: Customer connected from Live Chat
system: Please hold, we're connecting you to IKEA live chat
system: Your estimated wait time is approximately 15 minutes
agent: Hello! IKEA customer support here — how can I help you today?
customer: I need to update the shipping address on my order.
agent: Certainly! Could you please provide your order number and the new address?
customer: Order 987654321. New address is 123 Maple Street, Springfield, IL.
agent: Thanks! The address has been updated successfully. You'll receive a confirmation email shortly.
customer: Perfect, thanks for the quick help.
agent: My pleasure! Let me know if there's anything else.
customer: No, that's it. Bye!
agent: Goodbye! Thanks for choosing IKEA. Have a great day.

customer: Customer connected from Live Chat
system: Please hold, we're connecting you to IKEA live chat
system: Your estimated wait time is approximately 20 minutes
agent: Hello! This is IKEA support. What can I do for you today?
customer: I want to cancel my order #1122334455 please.
agent: Sure, I can help with that. May I have the reason for cancellation?
customer: I found the same item cheaper elsewhere.
agent: Thank you for explaining. The order has been canceled and refund initiated. Expect it in 5–7 business days.
customer: Understood, thanks for the quick response.
agent: Happy to help! Anything else I can do for you today?
customer: No, that's it. Cheers!
agent: Thanks for chatting with IKEA. Have a great day—goodbye!

customer: Customer connected from Live Chat
system: Please hold, we're connecting you to IKEA live chat
system: Your estimated wait time is less than 2 minutes
agent: Hi there! Welcome to IKEA support. How may I help you?
customer: Hello, I want to return an item I bought yesterday.
agent: Sure — do you have the order number and reason for return?
customer: Order 246801357. I changed my mind.
agent: No problem, your return is approved. You can drop off at any IKEA store within 30 days.
customer: Great, thanks!
agent: You're welcome — anything else I can do for you?
customer: Nope, that's all. Goodbye!
agent: Thanks for chatting—have a lovely day. Goodbye!

customer: Customer connected from Live Chat
system: Please hold, we're connecting you to IKEA live chat
system: Your estimated wait time is less than 3 minutes
agent: Hi! IKEA Customer Care, how can I assist you tonight?
customer: My promo code isn’t applying at checkout.
agent: I’m sorry about that! Could you please share the code and the items in your cart?
customer: Code: SAVE20. Cart has a desk lamp and rug.
agent: Thanks! SAVE20 applies to orders over $150—your cart is $120. Would you like to add something else to reach it?
customer: Let me add a plant stand for $35.
agent: Great choice! Your total is now $155. Promo applied. Anything else I can help with?
customer: Nope, thanks. You’re awesome!
agent: Thanks so much! Happy to help—have a wonderful evening!

customer: Customer connected from Live Chat
system: Please hold, we're connecting you to IKEA live chat
agent: Hi there! This is Maria from IKEA Brooklyn. How can I help you today?
customer: Hi Maria, I left my phone charger at the IKEA Brooklyn cafeteria yesterday. Is there a lost and found I can contact?
agent: Yes, we do have a lost and found! Please call the Brooklyn store directly at (718) 246-4532 and ask for Security.
customer: Thanks so much. I'll do that now.
agent: You're welcome! I hope they find it for you. Have a great day!
